channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Social Security’s COLA could drop to 2.1% in 2026 from 2.5% in 2025
item.description: The cost-of-living adjustment forecast would mark the lowest increase since the start of the pandemic.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Extend Decline
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell for an eighth consecutive week amid declines in imports and domestic production, while product stocks saw further larg...

item.title: Bank of New York Mellon Profit Climbs on Higher Fee Revenue, Lower Costs
item.description: Bank of New York Mellon said quarterly earnings leapt higher as fee and interest revenue climbed and costs came down from a year earlier.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Climb on Inflation Data, Bank Earnings
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, with new inflation data reviving hopes of rate cuts, and solid results from big banks setting a strong tone for this earnings season...

item.title: GM looks to make cheaper EV batteries after signing multibillion-dollar deal
item.description: General Motors aims to boost EV profitability with its deal with Norway-based graphite manufacturer Vianode for battery materials.

item.title: Oil prices climb as traders weigh OPEC and IEA demand forecasts
item.description: Oil futures climbed Wednesday, finding support after snapping a three-day winning streak that had been driven in part by wider U.S. sanctions on Russi...

item.title: JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs Post Surging Profits
item.description: Big bank profits surged in the fourth quarter and Wall Street roared back to life, with net income rising 50% at JPMorgan Chase and more than doubling...

item.title: ‘She is very manipulative and controlling’: My mother offered to buy me an apartment, but there are strings. Is it foolish to say no?
Australian Dollar Could Fall Amid China Headwinds
item.description: The Australian dollar could weaken slightly in coming months against a firm U.S. dollar and amid Chinese economic headwinds, Rabobank’s Jane Foley sai...

item.title: December’s CPI inflation data produces biggest plunge in yields since November
item.description: U.S. government debt aggressively rallied after the monthly core inflation reading from Wednesday’s consumer-price index for December came in softer t...
